titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3497) to amend the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to preserve and strengthen the Social Security Program through the creation of personal Social Security guarantee accounts ensuring full benifits for all workers and their families, restoring long-term Social Security solvency, to make certain benefit improvements, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mrs. Thurman. Petition No: 107-7.

bill.summary: 5/21/2002--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3497 (Social Security Guarantee Program).
